step1.para: Chock wheels.
Remove right side skirt assembly for access (2 people).
Raise vehicle, support axle with stands.
Drain air tanks and close petcocks.
Disconnect air lines necessary to remove air tank with frame assembly.
Remove bolts/clevis pin retaining air tank assembly. Remove air tank assembly.
Remove front section of drive shaft. Support center section.
Remove air dryer from vehicle for access.
Remove air hose and electrical harness attached to crossmember located behind transmission.
Remove bolts retaining crossmember.
Remove crossmember.
Remove bolts retaining shift tower/stick. Push shift stick up through floor opening (boot). Lay stick on floor of cab.
Disconnect all electrical connections from transmission.
Disconnect all air lines necessary to remove transmission.
Disconnect clutch lever from linkage.
Disconnect transmission oil cooler lines from transmission. Secure lines out of way for access.
Remove clutch inspection cover plate.
Remove bolts retaining fuel line support bracket to bell housing. Secure lines out of way for access.
Remove all bolts except 2 retaining transmission to engine.
Install and secure transmission jack to transmission.
Remove remaining bolts retaining transmission. Remove transmission from engine.
Install transmission to engine. Install all bolts retaining transmission to engine, except fuel support bracket bolts.
Remove transmission jack.
Install fuel support bracket to bell housing.
Torque all bell housing bolts to spec.
Connect clutch linkage.
Install clutch inspection cover.
Install transmission oil cooler lines to transmission.
Install transmission shift tower and stick. Torque bolts to spec.
Connect all air lines to transmission.
Connect all electrical connections to transmission.

note.para: Prior to installation of crossmember, grind off left side lower corner edges of crossmember. Grind off about 1/8 inch, and about 2 inches up the side outside edge of crossmember. This will ease the installation of the crossmember into the frame rails.

step1.para: Install crossmember into position.
Install bolts retaining crossmember. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air hose and electrical harness to crossmember.
Install air dryer.
Install drive shaft. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air tank assembly.
Connect air lines to air tanks.
Lower vehicle.
Install skirt assembly.
Remove wheel chocks.
Check vehicle operation.
